SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_invest_info (ii_login_id, ii_login_name, ii_true_name, ii_third_account, ii_order_number, ii_bp_id, ii_bp_name, ii_money, ii_freeze_status, ii_contract_url, ii_bp_repayed_periods, ii_create_time, ii_update_time, ii_is_del, ii_contract_no, ii_ssn, ii_platform, ii_platform_type, ii_channel, ii_channel_type) values (#{iiLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{iiLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiTrueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiThirdAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiBpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{iiBpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iiFreezeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iiContractUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiBpRepayedPeriods,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{iiCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{iiUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{iiIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iiContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iiPlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iiPlatformType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iiChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iiChannelType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update tb_invest_info
ii_login_id = #{iiLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ii_login_name = #{iiLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_true_name = #{iiTrueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_third_account = #{iiThirdAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_order_number = #{iiOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_bp_id = #{iiBpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ii_bp_name = #{iiBpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_money = #{iiMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ii_freeze_status = #{iiFreezeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ii_contract_url = #{iiContractUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_bp_repayed_periods = #{iiBpRepayedPeriods,jdbcType=CHAR},
ii_create_time = #{iiCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ii_update_time = #{iiUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ii_is_del = #{iiIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ii_contract_no = #{iiContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_ssn = #{iiSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ii_platform = #{iiPlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ii_platform_type = #{iiPlatformType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ii_channel = #{iiChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ii_channel_type = #{iiChannelType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ii_id = #{iiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_invest_info set ii_login_id = #{iiLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ii_login_name = #{iiLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_true_name = #{iiTrueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_third_account = #{iiThirdAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_order_number = #{iiOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_bp_id = #{iiBpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ii_bp_name = #{iiBpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_money = #{iiMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ii_freeze_status = #{iiFreezeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ii_contract_url = #{iiContractUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_bp_repayed_periods = #{iiBpRepayedPeriods,jdbcType=CHAR}, ii_create_time = #{iiCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ii_update_time = #{iiUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ii_is_del = #{iiIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ii_contract_no = #{iiContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_ssn = #{iiSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ii_platform = #{iiPlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ii_platform_type = #{iiPlatformType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ii_channel = #{iiChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ii_channel_type = #{iiChannelType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ii_id = #{iiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: ii_id, ii_login_id, ii_login_name, ii_true_name, ii_third_account, ii_contract_no, ii_bp_id, ii_bp_name, ii_money, ii_freeze_status, ii_contract_url, ii_bp_repayed_periods, ii_create_time, ii_update_time, ii_is_del, bp_bid_money, ii_ssn
mapper.select:
select
from tb_invest_info, tb_bid_plan
AND ii_bp_id = bp_id
SELECT sum(ii_money) FROM tb_invest_info WHERE ii_bp_id = #{iiBpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ii_is_del = 1

select ii.ii_id, ii.ii_bp_id as bp_id, ii.ii_bp_name as bp_name, ii.ii_create_time as create_time, IFNULL(ii.ii_money,0) as money, IFNULL(bp.bp_periods,0)*IFNULL(bp.bp_cycle_size,0) as periods, bp.bp_cycle_type as cycle_type, bp.bp_rate, (1-(IFNULL(bp.bp_surplus_money,0) / IFNULL(bp.bp_bid_money,0)))*100 AS progress, ii.ii_contract_url as contract_url from tb_invest_info ii inner join tb_bid_plan bp on ii.ii_bp_id=bp.bp_id where ii.ii_is_del = 1 and bp.bp_is_del = 1 and ii.ii_login_id = #{record.iiLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ii.ii_freeze_status = #{record.iiFreezeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ii.ii_id desc
LIMIT #{pageWhere.begin},#{pageWhere.pageSize}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ii_money),0) AS total_freeze FROM tb_invest_info WHERE ii_login_id = #{iiLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ii_freeze_status = 1 AND ii_is_del = 1
SELECT sum(ii_money) AS ii_money, ii_true_name FROM tb_invest_info GROUP BY ii_login_id ORDER BY ii_money DESC LIMIT 8
